name: Chaos Colosseum
description:
Chaos Colosseum

The Mad King has tasked the two of you gladiators to clear through waves of enemies in a post-apocalyptic colosseum. The only problem? There's only one gun.

This game is designed as a two-player experience! You can play either with one person using a keyboard and the other a controller or both players using controllers.

Controls: ControllerMouse + KeyboardActionLeft Analog StickWASDMovementRight Analog StickMouseAimBottom Face ButtonSpaceJumpRT/R2
